data.text: ARCHIE COMICS Random House Adult Blue Omni, Spring 2013 Archie Comics Sabrina the Teenage Witch: The Magic Within 1 Tania del Rio 9781936975396 Pub Date: 3/26/13, On Sale Date: 3/26 Ages 10 And Up, Grades 5 And Up $10.99/$11.99 Can. 256 pages Paperback / softback / Digest format paperback Juvenile Fiction / Comics & Graphic Novels Series: Sabrina MangaTerritory: World Ctn Qty: 1 5.250 in W | 7.500 in H 133mm W | 191mm H Summary: Coinciding with the debut of a brand new Sabrina the Teenage Witch animated series in 2013, Archie collects the first 10 issues of the fan-favorite "American manga" version of Sabrina in the classic 5 1/4 x 7 1/2" black and white manga format. This graphic novel release follows the resurgence of the Sabrina Manga series on the Archie app. With the help of the new awareness built around the new TV series and the explosion of the teen paranormal romance genre, we expect this quality title... Author Bio: TANIA DEL RIO is an American cartoonist working mainly in comic books who has been published in TOKYOPOP's Rising Stars of Manga Anthology. She worked for Archie Comics as the writer and artist of Sabrina the Teenage Witch, a monthly comic that was given a sh√Ö jo manga makeover. She also wrote Archie's highly publicized "Reversedale" story and has worked on Archie's Josie & the Pussycats and their Sonic the Hedgehog comic as both writer and artist. In addition to her work at Archie, ... Random House Adult Blue Omni, Spring 2013 Red Circle New Crusaders Ian Flynn, Ben Bates 9781936975310 Pub Date: 4/9/13, On Sale Date: 4/9 $14.99/$17.99 Can. 160 pages Paperback / softback / Trade paperback (US) Comics & Graphic Novels / Superheroes Series: New Crusaders Ctn Qty: 1 6.625 in W | 10.188 in H 168mm W | 259mm H Summary: It's the highly-anticipated debut of an exciting new generation of superheroes. Action-packed, accessible, and funny, this is a book for both adults and teens. First announced in the New York Times and supported by a digital initiative and a comic shop direct market component, we expect this title to be a real breakout series, especially with adult superhero fans and collectors. This book follows the adventures of a young team of legacy heroes led by the original patriotic superhero, t... Author Bio: IAN FLYNN has been the chief writer for Archie's popular and record-setting Sonic the Hedgehog comic for more than five years, including the headline-grabbing Sonic: Genesis storyline and graphic novel. He is the main writer of its sister title Sonic Universe and accompanying graphic novels since the title's inception, and is also the writer of Archie's Mega Man series, another critical and popular hit. Flynn is now also helming the much-anticipated New Random House Adult Blue Omni, Spring 2013 Archie Comics Jinx: Little Miss Steps J. Torres, Rick Burchett, Terry Austin 9781936975419 Pub Date: 4/23/13, On Sale Date: 4/23 $9.99/$10.99 Can. 112 pages Paperback / softback / Trade paperback (US) Juvenile Fiction / Social Issues Series: Jinx Ctn Qty: 1 6.000 in W | 9.000 in H 152mm W | 229mm H Related Products Other Formats 9781936975426 $16.99 4/23/13 Hardcover Summary: The second title in the critically acclaimed full-color original graphic novel series for tween and teen girls by the award-winning writer/artist team of J. Torres and Rick Burchett. The Jinx series continues to build a positive buzz as Archie has promoted this series in a big way, providing our most extensive review outreach ever to the library, book trade, and comics press as well as an official launch event at the American Library Association Dallas conference. This critically accla... Author Bio: J. TORRES won the Shuster Award for Outstanding Writer for his work on Batman: Legends of the Dark Knight, Love as a Foreign Language and Teen Titans Go. He is also the writer of the Eisner Award-nominated Alison Dare and the YALSA listed Days Like This and Lola: A Ghost Story. RICK BURCHETT is a comic book artist who is the recipient of Random House Adult Blue Omni, Spring 2013 - July 2012 Page 1
